item.title: Blog: HEIR as a Platform for Research (and new YouTube Channel)
item.description:
On 2024-12-05, the HEIR team presented a talk aimed at giving researchers a high-level overview of the HEIR project, brainstorming where new research might be needed, and discussing how the HEIR team could help with research projects.

The video recording of this talk is on YouTube, and this is the first video posted on the new HEIR YouTube channel.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-12-12
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-12-12.

This is the last meeting for 2023. Please respond to this poll for 2024 scheduling preferences.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-10-24
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-10-24.

Also of note: our talk at FHE.org was last Thursday (recording), and the similar talk at the LLVM developers meeting talk was the previous Wednesday, though the video has not yet been posted for that.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-06-30
item.description:
The second HEIR meeting was 2023-05-30 (notes, and video recording).

There are some initial design discussion threads started on GitHub Discussions to get the design rolling.

  • High-Level FHE Dialect
  • Scheme Dialects
  • Poly/Math Dialects

item.title: Blog: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hello, world! We’re starting a project to unify homomorphic encryption compiler IRs.

Our initial meeting was 2023-05-30 (read-only copy of the minutes). Stay tuned for future updates while we work out a meeting schedule.
